name: Onboarding a new Frontend Engineer.txt - General
description: This section outlines the initial steps and recommendations for a new Frontend Engineer joining the team. It covers assigning a buddy and mentor, setting up meetings, joining relevant communication channels, understanding the products, setting up development environments, and installing necessary applications. The goal is to provide guidance and resources to help the new engineer smoothly integrate into the team and start contributing effectively.
use_cases: Facilitating smooth integration into the team
Providing resources and guidance for new engineers
Setting up development environments and tools
capabilities: Setting up meetings with manager and mentor
Setting up SSH and cloning repositories

name: Onboarding a new Frontend Engineer.txt - Access
description: This section outlines the steps required for a new Frontend Engineer to gain access to various tools, platforms, and resources necessary for their role at Razorpay. It covers requesting access to email groups, software packages, applications, development environments, GitHub repositories, and learning resources. The section also provides tips on using the Kubernetes CLI and monitoring pods in the development environment.
use_cases: Granting access to development tools and resources
Joining internal communities and learning platforms
capabilities: Access to software packages (Amplitude, Coralogix, GitHub, Grafana, Figma, Jira, Querybook, Redash, Zenduty)
Access to learning platforms (CSS for JavaScript Developers, Books)
